languages.text: If an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} given by the character's abilities or talents grants {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, the target gains +4 additional MP; if {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} — the target gains +1 additional AP.
languages.original_text: Если {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, предоставленный способностью или талантом персонажа, дает цели {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очки передвижения{/g}, то цель получает +4 ОП дополнительно; а если {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}очки действия{/g} — +1 ОД дополнительно.

traits.locale_text: If an extra turn given by the character's abilities or talents has movement points, the target gains +4 additional movement points; if action points — the target gains +1 additional action point.
If an extra turn given by the character's abilities or talents grants movement points, the target gains +4 additional movement points; if action points — the target gains +1 additional action point.

If an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} given by the character's abilities or talents grants {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, the target gains +4 additional MP; if {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} — the target gains +1 additional AP.

languages.text: Si un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno adicional{/g} proporcionado por las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} o los {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g} del personaje proporciona {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}, el objetivo recibe +4 PM adicionales. Si concede {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, el objetivo recibe +1 PA adicional.
languages.original_text: If an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} given by the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} grants {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, the target gains +4 additional MP; if {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} — the target gains +1 additional AP.

traits.locale_text: Si un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno adicional{/g} proporcionado por las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} o los {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g} del personaje proporciona {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g}, el objetivo gana +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}puntos de movimiento{/g} adicionales; si concede {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g}, el objetivo gana +1 punto de acción adicional.

languages.text: このキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}によって{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}が与えられた場合、または{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}タレント{/g}にとって{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が与えられた場合、対象は追加で{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}MP{/g}が+4される。APの場合、対象は追加でAPが+1される。
languages.original_text: If an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} given by the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} grants {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, the target gains +4 additional MP; if {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} — the target gains +1 additional AP.

traits.locale_text: このキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}によって{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}が与えられた場合、または{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}タレント{/g}にとって{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}が与えられた場合、対象は追加で{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}移動ポイント{/g}が+4される。{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}の場合、対象は追加でアクションポイントが+1される。

languages.text: 当此角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}赋予目标{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}时，若此效果会赋予目标{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，则目标额外获得4点移动点数，若此效果会赋予目标{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，则目标额外获得1点行动点数。
languages.original_text: If an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} given by the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} grants {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, the target gains +4 additional MP; if {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} — the target gains +1 additional AP.

traits.locale_text: 如果此角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}赋予目标{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，若此效果会赋予{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，则目标额外获得4点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}移动点数{/g}，若此效果会赋予{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，则目标额外获得1点行动点数。

languages.text: Wenn ein {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} durch {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g} des Charakters {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} gewährt, erhält das Ziel +4 zusätzliche BP; wenn {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} gewährt werden, erhält das Ziel +1 zusätzlichen AP.
languages.original_text: If an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} given by the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} grants {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, the target gains +4 additional MP; if {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} — the target gains +1 additional AP.

traits.locale_text: Wenn eine {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Extra-Runde{/g} durch {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g} des Charakters {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} gewährt, erhält das Ziel +4 zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}Bewegungspunkte{/g}; wenn {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkte{/g} gewährt werden, erhält das Ziel +1 zusätzlichen Aktionspunkt.

languages.text: Si un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} octroyé par les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} du personnage confère des {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}, la cible bénéficie de +4 PD de plus ; s'il s'agit de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, la cible bénéficie de +1 PA de plus.
languages.original_text: If an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} given by the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} grants {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, the target gains +4 additional MP; if {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} — the target gains +1 additional AP.

traits.locale_text: Si un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} octroyé par les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} du personnage confère des {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g}, la cible bénéficie de +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}points de déplacement{/g} de plus ; s'il s'agit de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}points d'action{/g}, la cible bénéficie de +1 point d'action de plus.

languages.text: Если {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, предоставленный способностью или талантом персонажа, дает цели {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очки передвижения{/g}, то цель получает +4 ОП дополнительно; а если {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}очки действия{/g} — +1 ОД дополнительно.

Если {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, предоставленный {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностью{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талантом{/g} персонажа, дает цели {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очки передвижения{/g}, то цель получает +4 ОП дополнительно; а если {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}очки действия{/g} — +1 ОД дополнительно.
